++ Michael the Werewolf

Age: 25 in 2001
Build: slim. Brown hair, freckles.

Michael is a nurse who works at the same hospital as [George] and [Susan]. He is friendly with George, but not friends.

July-2001
All that changes when Michael is attacked by a werewolf on the way home from an evening shift. the next full moon he turns into a werewolf. The next time George sees him at work, he recognises what Michael has become. George follows him next full moon, while he is human, and while he is in wolf form. When Michael falls asleep and reverts to human, George takes him home. three weeks later, Michael moves into George's spare room. (Aug-2001)

Michael is already sleeping with Susan, and infects her. (Sep-2001)
